string_table.name: pxabnsnfns00001100101
string_table.string: Use your arrow keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

slidelink.displaytext: When were the 17 Sustainable Development Goals established by the United Nations ?
What is the worlds average poverty rate in rural areas ?
Despite progress, how many people worldwide still suffer from hunger ?
In 2018, how many children and adolescents under the age of 15 were estimated to of died from preventable diseases around the world ?
In 2014, what is the ratio of children attending pre-primary school education in least developed countries (LDCs) and landlocked developing countries (LLDCs), in sub-Saharan Africa ?
How many women between the ages of 15 and 49 report experiencing physical or sexual violence by an intimate partner within a 12-month period ?
How many people in the world still practice open defecation ?
What is the worlds annual death toll from indoor air pollution ?
How much unpaid care and domestic work do women do compared to men ?
How much will it cost annually to make infrastructure resilient to disasters and climate change ?
How many people with significant disabilities have access to disability benefits globally ?
What percentage of the worlds population currently live in cities ?
How much money would be saved annually if the world switched to energy efficient light bulbs ?
Which year was the 2nd warmest year on record ?
How many people depend on marine and coastal biodiversity for their livelihoods ?
How many people around the world were fleeing war in 2018 ?
In 2016, which 6 countries met the United Nations target for Net official development assistance (ODA) of 0.7 per cent of gross national income (GNI) ?
How many people depend on forests for their livelihoods ?
